casebody.data:
Second Department,

June, 1963

(June 1, 1961) In the Matter of John C. Krause, Sr., Respondent, v. Wilfred Reape, Appellant.

Motion by appellant to extend his time to answer the petition, pending appeal, granted to the extent of extending appellant’s time until 10 days after entry of the order hereon; otherwise denied. Nolan, P. J., Beldock, Kleinfeld, Christ and Pette, JJ., concur.
